FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: “Dead or alive, my creations are stronger than Jin-Gitaxias’s septic minions.” —Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

SPELL_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Put target card from a graveyard on top of its owner’s library.
Put target card from a graveyard on top of its owner’s library.

Put target card from a graveyard on top of its owner’s library.
SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:GuidedReveal( ZONE_GRAVEYARD , ZONE_LIBRARY ) target:PutOnTopOfLibrary() end
